text: Ki ha’la tomalokara! Yetiya tomalokara oparata bipada ahile (uhudara yud'dhata) tetiya tomaloke ka’ba dharaila, ‘e'ito kara paraa ahila’? Athaca tomaloke dbiguna bipada ghatiya'ichila (badarara yud'dhata). Koraa, ‘e'ito tomalokara nijara (dosara) karane'i ahiche’; niscaya allaha sakalo bastura oparata purna ksamatabana
